name: 6 Years
description:
A game I made for my partner for our 6 year anniversary.

Made with some free assets, listed below:

https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/4108/simple-menu
https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/6076/fc-s-dialogue-system
http://gaurav.munjal.us/Universal-LPC-Spritesheet-Character-Generator/
(some tile assets from FriendlyCosmonaut's YouTube series of her Farming RPG tutorial)
https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-rpg-pack
https://freesound.org/people/xtrgamr/sounds/277441/
